## Sexual dimorphism
```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
penguins %>%
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = bill_length_mm, y=bill_depth_mm, color=sex)) +
  geom_point(size=1) +
  facet_wrap(~species)
```
